title: Sonnet 60 - the verbs in lines 9-12 dramatize

content.question: The verbs in lines 9-12—“transfix,” “delves,” “Feeds on,” and “mow”—serve to dramatize

choices.label: the speaker's control over his fate
the speaker's despair that his art will not endure
time's absolute control over human life

content.answer: time's absolute control over human life

skill.text: Skill 6.C: Identify and explain the function of personification.
